solution_line_template: {total_distance} miles into {num_portions} equal portions will be {total_distance}/{num_portions} = <<{total_distance}/{num_portions}={portion_length}>>{portion_length} miles each
Abel traveled at a speed of {speed} miles per hour for {time_traveled} hours so he will cover {speed}*{time_traveled} = <<{speed}*{time_traveled}={distance_traveled}>>{distance_traveled} miles

{portion_length} miles make a portion so {distance_traveled} miles is equivalent to {distance_traveled}/{portion_length} = <<{distance_traveled}/{portion_length}={portions_covered}>>{portions_covered} portions
